content:
Sure, here are the wireframes for the other pages of the Weather Travel app:

**Homepage:**

| Component | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Navigation Bar | Allows users to navigate to other pages |
| Search Bar | Allows users to search for travel destinations |
| Featured Destinations | Displays a selection of popular travel destinations |
| Weather Information | Displays current weather information for the user's current location |
| Destination Categories | Displays categories of travel destinations (e.g. beach, mountains, cities) |
| Testimonials | Displays user reviews and testimonials |

**Search Results:**

| Component | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Navigation Bar | Allows users to navigate to other pages |
| Search Bar | Allows users to search for travel destinations |
| Search Filters | Allows users to filter search results based on weather conditions, travel dates, and other preferences |
| Search Results | Displays a list of travel destinations matching the user's search criteria |
| Destination Information | Provides detailed information about each destination, including weather patterns and best times to visit |
| Book Now Button | Allows users to book travel arrangements for the selected destination |

**Destination Details:**

| Component | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Navigation Bar | Allows users to navigate to other pages |
| Destination Information | Provides detailed information about the selected destination, including weather patterns, best times to visit, and activities/attractions |
| Reviews | Displays user reviews and ratings for the selected destination |
| Book Now Button | Allows users to book travel arrangements for the selected destination |

**Booking Page:**

| Component | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Navigation Bar | Allows users to navigate to other pages |
| Booking Form | Allows users to enter their travel details and preferences |
| Recommended Packages | Displays recommended travel packages based on the user's preferences |
| Package Details | Provides detailed information about each travel package |
| Book Now Button | Allows users to book the selected travel package |

**User Profile:**

| Component | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Navigation Bar | Allows users to navigate to other pages |
| Profile Information | Displays the user's profile information, including past bookings and saved destinations |
| Edit Profile Button | Allows users to edit their profile information |
| Saved Destinations | Displays a list of the user's saved destinations |
| Booking History | Displays a list of the user's past bookings |
| Logout Button | Allows users to log out of the app |

By organizing the components of each page into a table, the app's designers and developers can better visualize the layout and hierarchy of each page, ensuring a user-friendly and intuitive interface.
